name: factional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving a group within a larger group, especially one with slightly different ideas from the main group: factional leaders The alliance is divided by factional infighting. See
faction
More examplesFewer examplesFactional representatives gathered to draw up a new constitution.He had to work with factional leaders opposed to his reform agenda.They were embroiled in factional struggles and broke with the president.
